Summary: i was jr in college,,, and saw,, some thing flying,, and do not know !!!!
divs: Sighting Details i was jr. in college,,it was weekend and my buddy and i had 2, girls that we took to my house for evening swim ,,, parents had pool,, i took girl and blanket,, and went to park across the street from our house and we were laying on blanket looking at stars,, and doing what kids like to do ,,so all of sudden,,, i look up and see,, round metal disk,, aprox 80,, to 100,, diamiter,, it was not flat on bottom it had a slight redius,,,and the color was exactly,, like copper on bottom of paul revere,, skillet,, it was not shiney,, but tarnished,, and it was going about,, 8,, to 10 miles per hr. the clear night,, and good street lights gave us a pretty good look see,,, it came from east and was traveling west,, i looked at bottom looking for port,, and gang of rivets like on air plane when gear is up,, i could not see anything,, in avaliable light it looked flush,,i told girl look,, you are looking at ufo,, and then i said ,, you are looking at techonolgy we are not aware of,, there was no engine noise,,that damn thing just floated,,, and was on a corse,, i was really moved,, i told her let,s go ,, we went to house,, and i called lambert field,, control tower,, and i spoke to a,t,c controller,, i said to him i just saw,, ufo,, and gave him vector,, and described ,, craft and speed ,,, and he said ,, i see it ,, as we spoke he was looking at it,, i knew how to get to atc,, because i am pilot,, with multi eng rating,, i took my first flying lesson when i was 14,, my father was flyer,, and we always had at least one airplane,, most of time we had 2,, planes,, we loved flying,, i then signed off from atc,, and called the big radio station,, in town,,KMOX,, i got business ,, and news desk,, and described the event,, it was clear night and i guess lots of people were out,, it was really nice summer night,, the man at news desk said i was 8th ,, call on the object,, i was really moved ,,, i really didn't know how aircraft,, could stay in air with no obvious propulsion ,, that was really goofy,, i still have not figured that out,, it,s beyond my,, knowlege,, about a month went by and i contacted usaf,, they sent me a packet with little pictures of goofy little space ships,, it was very goofy,,, i wanted to be,,de briefed,, by scientest,, i wanted to talk to someone with a brain,, this damn thing really got my attention ,, that was 40 yr. ago,, and i can remember it like yesterday,, i was watching history channel ,,, when i saw mufon,,,!!!! before that night,, when i saw hillbilly,s,, talking about little green men,,, i thought ,,, ya,,, right,, i went to college for 6,,yr,, did graduate work ,, and i only hang with very smart people,, honest injin,, im not a nut case,, i lost track of girl,, but she would not be much help ,,, she had no idea what was going on,, i drink a beer ,, now ,, then,, and have never did drugs,, you see flyer,s,,, don,t do drug,s drug,s are for idiot,s,,, thank you for this site,, it,s a good thing,, i know something is out there,,, when i see those idiot,s,,, down in mexico throwing hubcaps,, and saying look ,,, it,s ufo,, that crap is so corney,, this thing actually scared the c---,,, out of me,, thank you ron von der ahe
trends: There have been 74 other sightings in St Louis
There were no other sightings in St Louis on or around July 12th 1967
